text: Ecco van der Veer (born 17 November 1996) is a martial arts fighter. He represents the Netherlands in ju-jitsu fighting at international competitions in the category fighting adults male -62 kg. Van der Veer trained judo and ju- jitsu from the age of 7 at Van Diermen Sport in Soest, where he grew up and still lives. From 2017 he started at Den Edel in Gouda. At the end of 2017 he won his first bronze medal at the 2017 Ju-Jitsu World Championships in the -62 kg category at adults. He competed at the 2022 World Games, winning individually the bronze medal and also in the mixed team event where he was fighting up to 69 kilogram. At the end of the year of 2023 he became European Champion and he had Silver at World Championships 2021. His nickname is "The Machine". ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch martial artists
